articles.title: America's 'forever prisoner' has spent two decades in custody for planning the 9/11 attacks. But it's not clear he was involved - ABC News
articles.description: They thought they'd captured an Al Qaeda kingpin instrumental in the planning of the 9/11 attacks. But Abu Zubaydah was likely just a low-level terrorist "travel agent". Here's why the US still won't let him go.
articles.content:

articles.title: Robert E. Lee statue removed from pedestal in Richmond, Virginia - New York Post
articles.description: A statue of Confederate Gen. Robert E. Lee that is one of America’s largest monuments to the Confederacy was hosted off its pedestal and removed Wednesday to cheers in Richmond, Virginia.
